title: Dont miss out on this great home!
posting_body: ["Tucked away in Southwest Las Vegas Mountain's Edge neighborhood, Mountain Gate & Mountain Trails are here to offer residents a fresh take on luxury living.", 'Updated with modern finishes and designer touches, our 1 & 2 bedroom apartments for rent near Exploration Peak Park supply just the retreat youve been searching for.', '-24-Hour Athletic Centers Featuring Cardio, Free Weights, and Yoga Room', '-Move-in Deposit Free with Jetty', '-Covered Parking Available', '-Green Globes Certified', '-Poolside Barbecue Grills with Seating', '-Living Green Community Featuring On-Site Recycling Program', '-Close to the Las Vegas Strip', "-Located in Mountain's Edge Master Planned Community", '-Regular Community Events with Friendly Staff', '-Mountain Views', '-Expansive Community Walking and Biking Path to Exploration Park', '-Our apartment homes are cleaned only with organic products!', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', '*Equal housing opportunity*']
